title: Was there ever a gas station where the parking lot is for whole foods? I noticed multiple square boxes and soil monitoring wells in the pavement of that parking lot in the corner. I also noticed them across the street in the parking lot of the wells fargo. I have only seen these things at gas stations. I remember when Wilsons had another building where this parking lot is, but I don\'t remember there ever being a gas station there.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14407
